title: Sharing News

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Decide with the switch user what news they would like to share with a friend or classmate.
• Record a leading question on one switch to prompt a response e.g., "guess what I did at the weekend?"
• Record the follow-up message on the other switch e.g., "I went to the beach and had so much fun!"
• You could end the response with another question to encourage further conversation e.g., "what did you get up to at the weekend?"

tooltipText: Activate 2 switches to share news and ask questions
